title: Happy End wo Shinjiteru
original_name: ハッピーエンドを信じてる
sinopse:
Pure hearted but filthy minded fudanshi Hanamoto moves to Tokyo to find love and instantly meets the man of his dreams, Tsuchiya. But somehow the realities of love and sex are not as simple and straightforward as all the BL manga he's read has led him to believe.

(Source: MU)
